1370: Atghardis was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Rutgerus at age 16 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Wauthem in 1371 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Niels in 1372 at age 18.
1374: Gave birth to Meynolphus in 1374 at age 20.
1375: Gave birth to Marisseis in 1375 at age 21.
Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 1 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Baua in 1376 at age 22.
1381: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1381 at age 27.
1382: Gave birth to Aue in 1382 at age 28.
1383: Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 3 years old.
1386: Gave birth to Dolf in 1386 at age 32.
1387: Gave birth to Arnst in 1387 at age 33.
1390: Gave birth to Rutgerus in 1390 at age 36.
1394: Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
